A Panel application embedded in a Quarto doc

```{panel-python}
import panel as pn

pn.extension(design="material")

slider = pn.widgets.IntSlider(name="Select a value", value=0, start=0, end=100)
pn.Column(
    "# Hello Panel + Quarto!",
    pn.rx("The value is {}").format(slider)
).servable()
```

A stlite application embedded in a Quarto doc

```{stlite-python}
import streamlit as st

st.title("Hello Stlite + Quarto!")
value = st.slider("Select a value", 0, 100, 0)
st.write("You selected:", value)
```

A Matplotlib application embedded in a Quarto doc

```{python}
#| label: fig-polar
#| fig-cap: "A line plot on a polar axis"

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

r = np.arange(0, 2, 0.01)
theta = 4 * np.pi * r
fig, ax = plt.subplots(
  subplot_kw = {'projection': 'polar'} 
)
ax.plot(theta, r)
ax.set_rticks([0.5, 1.2, 1.5, 2])
ax.grid(True)
plt.show()
```
